title: Welcome to kuis
text:
welcome to your new hax site! click edit on the top bar get started what can i do?
weve got a ton of blocks that are easy use and lot done with little effort, so much in fact we made video exploring some them!
here's list just few things started, or if pro, delete this content have fun!
  
 by hitting "edit page" above
 hit enter paragraph text add another one
 "merlin" see all you do
 try video, insert video
 

this looks fun, let's go!

get involved hax

 

we hope enjoy working as team has enjoyed building it! want join our community, look for discord link among other ways involved!

 read teaching excellence resources
 community
 post an issue queue
